simplified: 授之以鱼不如授之以渔

pronunciation.pinyin: shòu zhī yǐ yú bù rú shòu zhī yǐ yú
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: shou4 zhi1 yi3 yu2 bu4 ru2 shou4 zhi1 yi3 yu2

details.simplified: 授之以鱼不如授之以渔
details.traditional: 授之以魚不如授之以漁

meanings.value: give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime
